title: Homesick James - Blues on the South Side (1964; 1990) [FLAC]
description:
artist/s: Homesick James
album: Blues on the South Side
label: Prestige/Original Blues Classics
number catalogue: 25218052924 (OBCCD-529-2)
package: factory pressed silver CD, jewel case
recording year/s: 1964
CD release year: 1990


Recorded in Chicago, IL, January 7, 1964.
Produced by Samuel Charters.
Digital Remastering: Kirk Felton, Fantasy Studios, Berkeley, 1990.
Reissue of Prestige PR 7388.
